score_categories.name: Excellent
score_categories.description: The startup demonstrates exceptional health and strong performance across most key metrics, significantly exceeding industry benchmarks.

score_categories.name: Good
score_categories.description: The startup shows good overall health, meeting or exceeding many industry benchmarks. Areas for minor improvement may exist.

score_categories.name: Average
score_categories.description: The startup's health is in line with average industry performance. There are clear opportunities for improvement in several areas.

score_categories.name: Needs Attention
score_categories.description: The startup's health indicates areas of concern, falling below average benchmarks. Critical metrics require immediate attention.

score_categories.name: Critical
score_categories.description: The startup is facing significant challenges, with performance critically low across multiple key metrics. Urgent intervention is recommended.
